archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.5.11b: b) prohibitng services, protocols and ports that are inherently susceptible to abuse (e.g. SQL Server (1433), FTP (21), NetBIOS (139), RPC (593), Telnet (23), POP3 (110), IMAP (143), PPTP (1723) and SNMP (161)).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
